description: Walking through the Great Library you pass through the almost
infinite rows of books, each glowing with their own unique energies.
You wonder what hand could have written all these books... until
their song lures you to read them.
20002.name: {&The {BG{&r{7e{&a{Bt {BL{&i{7bra{&r{By{0

description: Climbing up into the forest you suddenly see the
sky once more, the sun beating down upon your face.
All sorts of life live up inside the canopy as you
see all sort of avians flying around you.
Standing up here is an elf with some kind of shop
for all types of food.
20029.name: {&On the {@Ca{2no{@py {&of the {@Fo{2re{@st{0

description: You are suspended in a cool electric space above a translucent plain. You
You feel synesethesia invading your nerves and reshuffling your senses. The
sky is the same granite color as the ground and you can't find a horizon
A tiny mist flows from a crack in a statue.
20048.name: The Void

description: You are suspended in cool electric space above a translucent plain.  You feel
synesthesia invading your nerves and reshuffling your senses.  The sky is the
same obsidian color as the ground and you can't find a horizon.
You wonder if the void will ever end.
20041.name: The Void

description: The Four Mandates of the Hidden Lady
1. Thou art a   follower of Mystran, thy way is sacred and ye are
the favored of the lady. Trust her for she is the everguiding force. Do nae
defy the word of thy lady for judgement will be cast down upon those who
would forsake  the faith of the Mother of all Magi.
2. As ye are a follower of the true Art, ye can be good, evil, or neutral, but
the ways of the church are forever neutral. We will not take sides on matters
of rivalry (PK), if ye choose to align thyself with a friend ye may, but the
church will not support thee.
3.)As a  follower of Mystra thy fellow Mystran is thy brother or sister. Your
art is your most precious gift. If any are in trouble from those who would
persecute them, ye are obligated to help them in they time of need.
4.) Your faith does not have to be a all controlling factor of thy life. Mystra
is happy with just a simple prayer after a successful spell. But be forworned
the gift of the Hidden Lady is the most sacred and important thing in thy life
Abuse it and ye will bring down the wrath of thy lady upon thee. (Dont pk
anyone with a just cause. Simply getting eq is NOT a just cause. Revenge
can be taken if someone pked you, but do not let it consume you, as a
Mystran you have more things to think about then a petty pker. Always go
into a fight with a rp purpose. If you go into a  fight for no reason you will
be taken to the high tribunal and be judged if you are fit to stay as a Mystra)
And these are the four laws of the Mystran faith, while small in number
they are strict and hard to follow. Keep faith, my magi.
As you suddenly appear upon the isle of Mystra's dance you kiss the
sandy earth as you are finally glad to be away from the ocean, that had
flooded your ship. You wonder how you suddenly got here from where you
sank... you had been miles from any land... Well, anyways, you see miles
of palm trees waving the wind and beautiful shells adorning the beach...
though the shell are all in the shape of what seem to be nine stars...
20000.name: {&The {3I{2sl{3e {&of {BMy{^st{Bra's D{^an{Bce{0

description: Climbing up into the forest you suddenly see the
sky once more, the sun beating down upon your face.
All sorts of life live up inside the canopy as you
see all sort of avians flying around you.
Small droplet of waters seem to be reflecting light
from all around the forest.
20033.name: {&On the {@Ca{2no{@py {&of the {@Fo{2re{@st{0

description: Getting away from the river you once more enter a
clearing inside the forest of mysteries. You almost
wonder if this wasn't created by any common woodsman.
The orchards and waterfall seem to have been perfectly
placed in some kind of Kara-Turan technique of movement.
The pool is almost right in the middle and next to it...
is a native!? A chultan drum player is here playing his
music. The music seeming to play forever, the drummer playing
forever as well...
20009.name: {&A {7C{&l{7e{&ar{7i{&n{7g {&in the {@Fo{2re{@st{0

description: Climbing up into the forest you suddenly see the
sky once more, the sun beating down upon your face.
All sorts of life live up inside the canopy as you
see all sort of avians flying around you.
A elf of obviously high birth is selling drinks here,
you wonder why an elf is on a canopy in the forests and
why a high elf is selling drinks...
20032.name: {&On the {@Ca{2no{@py {&of the {@Fo{2re{@st{0

infinite rows of books, each glowing with their own unique energies.
You wonder what hand could have written all these books... until

synesthesia invading your nerves and reshuffling your senses.  The sky is the

20044.name: The Void

description: NO ONE IS ALLOWED IN THIS ROOM BY ORDER OF MYSTRA!
20030.name: {&A {*d{&a{7r{*k {&corner in the {*ca{&v{7e{&r{*ns{0

description: Crossing over the river you see all sorts of fish
and aquatic life through the crystal blue waters.
It almost has a serene and meditative feel about it.
20008.name: {&A {BR{7ive{Br {&going south.{0

description: You are suspended in cool electric space above a translucent plain.  You feel
synesthesia invading your nerves and reshuffling your senses.  The sky is the
same obsidian color as the ground and you can't find a horizon.
You wonder if the void will ever end.
20047.name: The Void

description: Getting away from the river you once more enter a
clearing inside the forest of mysteries. You almost
wonder if this wasn't created by any common woodsman.
The ground is made of pure white sand and for some reason
there seems to be two automatons standing still in the center
of the clearing.
20011.name: {&A {7C{&l{7e{&ar{7i{&n{7g {&in the {@Fo{2re{@st{0

description: You suddenly enter into a realm that seems to be
incredibly differant from the rest of the forest
of mysteries... Everything here glows with awesome
power, power that could only be created by some immortal
force. A gurgling spring flows continously in the
center of the clearing and to the side a chipped altar
sits imbedded in the damp ground. Next to the spring a
small fire is being tended by an ancient woman, her hair
blue and white. Even the vines seem to be placed perfectly
here, interwining and twisting to form walls against
the wild of the forest.
20034.name: {&A {7C{&l{7e{&ar{7i{&n{7g {&in the {@Fo{2re{@st{0

description: Leaving the forest of mysteries you suddenly step on
a sandy and muddy shore. You see that the shore leads to
a river flowing south.
20035.name: {&The {3b{#ank{3s {&of a {Br{7ive{Br{0

description: As you leave the library you once more enter into the
forest, but soon you reach a path to a clearing....
You almost wonder if this wasn't created by any common
woodsman. But... this isn't like the other clearings...
specks of blood and spell residue are all over the leaves
and foliage...
20010.name: {&A {&P{7at{&h {&to a {!Bl{1oo{!dy {7C{&l{7e{&ar{7i{&n{7g{0

description: You climb down from one of the cave openings and enter into
a maze of caverns. The stalagtites and stalactices from the
roof and ceiling are all each covered in underworld dampness,
fungus growing from the walls.
20016.name: {&A {*D{&a{7r{*k C{&a{7ve{&r{*n{0

description: The tiny tunnel curves to the east. The thoughts of why
a tunnel would be in a temple still bother you.
20021.name: {*A curve in the tunnel{0

description: You climb down from one of the cave openings and enter into
a maze of caverns. The stalagtites and stalactices from the
roof and ceiling are all each covered in underworld dampness,
fungus growing from the walls.
20015.name: {&The {*E{&nt{7ra{&nc{*e {&to a {*D{&a{7r{*k C{&a{7ve{&r{*n{0

description: The only clear path in this forest you notice how the
bricks seem to change colors from blue to white in an almost
chessboard-like design. The rest of this place is misty, the
fogs from the streams and rivers making it almost impossible
to see further than your nose. The sounds of wildlife that you
have never heard before fill the air, the only distinct sound
you can identify is that of a displacer beast...
Looking south, you can make out a pool that seems to be
bubbling with fresh and warm water.
20001.name: {&A {BP{bat{Bh {&in the {@Fo{2re{@st {&of {BMy{bs{&t{7e{&r{bi{Bes{0

description: You climb down from one of the cave openings and enter into
a maze of caverns. The stalagtites and stalactices from the
roof and ceiling are all each covered in underworld dampness,
fungus growing from the walls.
20017.name: {&A {*D{&a{7r{*k C{&a{7ve{&r{*n{0

description: The only clear path in this forest you notice how the
bricks seem to change colors from blue to white in an almost
chessboard-like design. The rest of this place is misty, the
fogs from the streams and rivers making it almost impossible
to see further than your nose. The sounds of wildlife that you
have never heard before fill the air, the only distinct sound
you can identify is that of a displacer beast...
Further north the forest suddenly stops as you see a clearing,
obviously made by some party before you. You can also see the
glow of something blue and white on the flat ground.
20004.name: {&A {BP{bat{Bh {&in the {@Fo{2re{@st {&of {BMy{bs{&t{7e{&r{bi{Bes{0

description: The only clear path in this forest you notice how the
bricks seem to change colors from blue to white in an almost
chessboard-like design. The rest of this place is misty, the
fogs from the streams and rivers making it almost impossible
to see further than your nose. The sounds of wildlife that you
have never heard before fill the air, the only distinct sound
you can identify is that of a displacer beast...
To the north of you, you can make the faint outlines of a hut.
The hut seems to be raised, but what seems to be something like
gigantic chicken... legs?!?!
20003.name: {&A {BP{bat{Bh {&in the {@Fo{2re{@st {&of {BMy{bs{&t{7e{&r{bi{Bes{0

synesthesia invading your nerves and reshuffling your senses.  The sky is the

20046.name: The Void

description: Getting away from the river you once more enter a
clearing inside the forest of mysteries. You almost
wonder if this wasn't created by any common woodsman.
But... this isn't like the other part of the clearing,
specks of blood and spell residue are all over the leaves
and foliage... You notice that... that there is some
kind of creature in the bushes. Your heart begins pumping.
Your muscles tense up...
20012.name: {&A {7C{&l{7e{&ar{7i{&n{7g {&in the {@Fo{2re{@st{0

description: A tiny tunnel has been carved inside the temple.
You wonder where it leads to...
20020.name: {*A tiny tunnel inside the temple{0

description: Entering into the spooky hut you see all types of
shrunken heads and cursed magic paraphanelia. The boards
creek with each step you make and the eyes of the heads
seem to follow you. You wonder if the person who owns this
place is anywhere around...
20025.name: {&A {*T{&in{*y {*Wi{&tc{*h's {3H{#u{3t {&in the {@Fo{2re{@st{0

same obsidian color as the ground and you can't find a horizon.
You wonder if the void will ever end.
20045.name: The Void

description: Climbing into this cave from up above you suddenly
notice a network of tunnels... and of other forms...
of life. You wonder where the three glimmers of light
lead to inside the three cave openings.
20026.name: {&A {*D{&ar{*k {&C{7av{&e beneath the {@Fo{2re{@st{0

infinite rows of books, each glowing with their own unique energies.

20043.name: The Void

description: As you walk out of the honeycombe systems of caverns,
you suddenly trip and fall down into an underground lake.
Interestingly enough, instead of glowing with the purple
auras of the Underdark, this cavern is almost blindingly
filled to the brim with pure blue light. Yet, even the drow
in the room don't seem bothered by it...
20018.name: {&A {*Un{&de{7rgr{&ou{*nd {BL{^ak{Be{0

description: Entering into a clearing in the forest of mysteries, you
suddenly notice that beneath you is a gigantic glowing pentagram.
The sense of great magicks and summons already fill in your mind.
The pentagram is constantly moving on the ground turning from blue
to white, from white to blue. But as you move your eyes from the ground
to the rest of the setting your jaw suddenly drops. Before you is a huge
gigantic castle made of diamonds, crystals, and almost every imaginable
mineral from the earth stands before you. An entire population of Chultan
fire ants inhabit the castle, only for some reason these ants... are
differant... smart...
20023.name: {&A {7C{&l{7e{&ar{7i{&n{7g {&in the {@Fo{2re{@st{0

description: Climbing up into the forest you suddenly see the
sky once more, the sun beating down upon your face.
All sorts of life live up inside the canopy as you
see all sort of avians flying around you.
20027.name: {&On the {@Ca{2no{@py {&of the {@Fo{2re{@st{0

description: A tiny tunnel has been carved inside the temple.
You wonder where it leads to...
20019.name: {*A tiny tunnel inside the temple{0

description: Entering into the room you suddenly see a large wall made of
one big pane of mirror... but something is wierd about this
wall. It has a whole new world for it's reflection!?! Gigantic
butterflies seem to be flying everywhere as a man looks back
at you!!!
20039.name: A glimps into another plane

description: Entering into a nest of Shou Dragon Dogs, you notice
that the most important part of the nest is missing, the
mother dragon dog. You wonder why a human sorceress is
guarding over such powerful being. A few eggs in the nest
still have no hatched yet, but already the new puppies are
a handful for the tired mage
20005.name: {&A {#N{3es{#t {&of {6S{2ho{6u {3Dr{1ag{3on {3D{1o{3gs{0

description: Crossing over the river you see all sorts of fish
and aquatic life through the crystal blue waters.
It almost has a serene and meditative feel about it.
20007.name: {&A {BR{7ive{Br {&going south.{0

to change colors from blue to white in an almost chessboard-like
design.  The rest of this place is misty, the fogs from the streams
and rivers making it almost impossible to see further than your nose.
The sounds of wildlife that you have never heard before fill the air,
the only distinct sound you can identify is that of a displacer

name: The Clanhall of the Church of Mystra

description:
An old woman is sitting next to the fire here, watching
as the soup bubbles.
20000.room_name: An old woman sits over the fire here.
20000.name: an old woman~

description:
The priestess, Hanei Oluvaeux, the former witch was recently converted
back to the priesthood of Mystra by Shara. In her ceremonial robes she is
waiting to sell you your necessary adventuring tools.
20001.room_name: Hanai Oluvaeux stands here selling her wares.
20001.name: The priestess, Hanei~

description:
A dummy is here imprinted with what seems
to be the face of the mad one...
20002.room_name: {&A dummy with the face of {%C{5y{*r{5i{%c{& the Mad is here.{0
20002.name: {&A dummy with the face of {%C{5y{*r{5i{%c{0~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
Before you is a gigantic dragon dog with massive paws
and claws that has claws that seemed to be three inches
long. Each claw is tipped with some type of blue dye. 
Though it's basic form is of a dog it's snout and head
is that of a shou dragon, possibly a tryst between the two
species?
20003.name: {&A {3gi{1an{3t dr{1ag{3on d{1o{3g{0~

description:
Hmm a dummy with the likeness of Talos has been
tied to a pole here....
20004.room_name: {&A dummy with the face of {$T{4a{&l{7o{$s{& is here.{0
20004.name: {&A dummy with the face of {$T{4a{&l{7o{$s{0~

description:
Given the duty to guide the followers of Mystra
through the church Olia guards her duty with all
her heart.
20005.room_name: Olia, a servant of mysteries stands here tending the nest.
20005.name: Olia servant of mysteries~

description:
A high elf by birth, Quinea soon left her old life. Finding it
to boring for her taste. After a lifetime of adventuring she 
has retired to her own bar.
20006.room_name: Quinea rummages through her bar looking for her lost wine goblet.
20006.name: Quinea~

description:
A tiny butterfly with a rainbow of colors on it's wings,
it's a wonder how it got down here in this dusty tunnel.
Odd... It's wings sort've look like nine stars... no that
can't be.
20007.name: An unassuming butterfly~

description:
Not a particularly handsome elf, this vendor does
make it up with the food he sells and creates.
20008.room_name: A elf is selling food here.
20008.name: An elf selling food~

description:
A massive beast of muscle and sinew, this displacer
beast seems to be loyal to only those of the church of
mysteries.
20009.name: A black displacer beast~

description:
With beautiful plumage and a golden beak, the
bird of paradise flies around in the forest.
20010.name: A bird of paradise~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description:
Chained long ago by magical chains forged by a highpriestess
of Mystra, this baatezu has been waiting here ready to kill 
anything that would come close to it. It has become a killing
machine... You only hope these chains stay on forever.
20011.room_name: {&A {*c{7h{*a{7i{*n{7e{*d {1ba{*ate{1zu{& sits here waiting for his revenge.{0
20011.name: {&A {*c{7h{*a{7i{*n{7e{*d {1ba{*ate{1zu{0~
subroutines:
M SPEECH 20004 suicide~
M SPEECH 20004 mystra~

description:
An elder of his race, this esper seems to be
pouring over some arcane text. You wonder what
he can teach you. Perhaps, you should ask him to
teach you...
20012.room_name: An elderly esper sits on top of the canopy reading a book on Maztica.
20012.name: An elderly esper~

description:
A gigantic butterfly from the rainforest of Chult,
this particular species is very aggressive to opponents,
but at the same time extremely loyal to those it would
assume 'potential mates'
20013.name: {&A {!g{3i{#a{3n{!t {!b{@u{#t{$t{%e{^r{!f{@l{#y{0~

description: A little clay statue with a crack in it.
20014.room_name: A little clay statue of a praying man sits here.
20014.name: A little clay statue~

description: There's not to much to say about this guy.... he's a butterfly watcher.
20015.room_name: Tovan, a butterfly watcher is here.
20015.name: Tovan~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK

description: A tiny gray rat with blue eyes crouches as it looks at you.
20016.room_name: A mist from the crack in the statue.
20016.name: A tiny wizard from the crack.~
subroutines:
M DEATH 20028 100~
M FIGHT 20005 85~
M GRALL 20026 100~

description:
A drow mystran stands here playing with something in his
hand.
20018.room_name: Ss'Thearavi Na'Talarathar, a drow high mage stands here.
20018.name: Ss'Thearavi Na'Talarathar~

description:
One of the deadly species of the fire ant genus,
this particular breed was magically altered and have
sense then evolved into a mental collective. Highly
intelligent, these ants have created civlizations that
have surpassed all humanoid make.
20019.name: a Chultan fire ant~

description:
From the inner forests of Chult, a gigantic triceratops has entered
into the Forests of Mysteries, lumbers around here and eats at the
shrubbery.
20020.name: a gigantic triceratops~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M GRALL 20015 100~

description:
A recent charity case from Mystra, the Lady of All Spell has allowed
the witch to handle her library.
20021.room_name: The witch librarian stands here in her rags.
20021.name: The witch librarian~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M GIVE 20019 shou~
M GIVE 20020 pomegranate~
M SPEECH 20016 quest~
M GIVE 20017 forelimb~

description:
The elven cat from the city of Myth Hagral is gray with green tufts
on the tips of it's ears. It's paws are massive and it uses them to
scratch the ground as it mews.
20022.name: The elven cat~

description: A being of no substance, the wind is the wind.
20023.room_name: The Whispering Wind flies about here.
20023.name: the Whispering Wind~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M ENTRY 20022 100~

description:
You think you saw the pygmy... but realize that it had gone to fast for
you to gain any knowledge of what it really looks like.
20024.room_name: A tiny pygmy with a staff is playing here.
20024.name: A tiny pygmy~
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
M GRALL 20023 25~

description: A tiny spider with blue and white markings.
20025.room_name: A tiny spiders sits here spinning it's web on the mirror.
20025.name: a Tiny Spider~
